hero.title: Growth Value for Your Business
hero.subtitle: We help businesses achieve sustainable growth through digital innovation

about.title: Nexdor Solutions
about.description: Nexdor Solutions takes pride in our experienced team and deep market understanding. We assist businesses in creating breakthrough brand strategies, from identity design to positioning and communication, helping them make a strong mark in the market. Additionally, Nexdor Solutions supports multi-platform store optimization, enabling businesses to reach target customers, increase visibility, and sustainably boost revenue. We are not just partners but also trusted companions, committed to helping you conquer every goal and create lasting value.

items.content: Sạp Lê La was a completely new brand, so we faced numerous challenges in the early stages of building our image and operating on e-commerce platforms. Nexdor helped us optimize everything from A to Z: setting up the store, creating content, devising reasonable pricing and promotion strategies, and running effective ads.

Previously, Đậu Má Mix had stores on food delivery platforms but they weren’t optimized, and performance was low. Partnering with Nexdor Solutions helped our stores improve everything from visuals and content to pricing strategies, making operations smoother.

From a small takeout rice stall, Cơm tấm Ba Lộc now has nearly 10 hubs and is about to open a dine-in restaurant. Thanks to Nexdor, our brand was professionally built from the logo and Uncle Ba Lộc character to a polished fanpage, helping Ba Lộc reach customers more effectively.

Gà Nướng Ò Ó O is a brand with a widespread store network, but optimizing our online stores still had limitations. Thanks to Nexdor, we significantly improved our visuals, content, pricing, and promotion strategies on food delivery platforms.

When Lucky Pao started online business, we struggled to attract customers and operate our store efficiently. Nexdor optimized every aspect—from brand building and image enhancement to running well-structured marketing campaigns.

leadSolution.description:
We create leverage for businesses to grow
into digital enterprises, enabling automation of multi-channel business processes
to break through revenue barriers.

services.brandConsultingDescription: Brand orientation and systemizing brand identity are always critical when aiming to scale up and elevate a business’s position. With a mindset of providing solutions and aligning with client goals, Nexdor will analyze everything from internal business factors to external elements, determining the right direction for future brand communication.
services.brandDevelopmentDescription: Does your existing brand still have untapped potential or issues to resolve? Or do you simply want to add more elements to fuel your communication efforts? Let Nexdor study your current state and help your brand grow through systemization, establishing direction, and creating consistent, compliant design products.
services.brandDesignDescription: Nexdor Solutions brings consistency, coherence, and uniqueness to your brand identity, enabling businesses to easily develop all aspects of brand design—from simple to complex—in a systematic way.
services.eCommerceDescription: E-commerce (Shopee, Lazada, TikTok Shop, etc.) has become a booming channel attracting significant attention recently. If your business wants to expand sales on e-commerce platforms but doesn’t know where to start or how to optimize paid ads for products, explore Nexdor’s solutions now.
services.qCommerceDescription: Q-commerce (GrabFood, ShopeeFood, BeFood, etc.) has become a booming channel attracting significant attention recently. If your business wants to expand sales on Q-commerce platforms but doesn’t know where to start or how to optimize paid ads for products, explore Nexdor’s solutions now.
services.socialCommerceDescription: Nexdor Solutions provides professional Social Commerce services, helping businesses maximize the power of social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and Zalo to reach target customers and boost sales. With creative content strategies, optimized advertising, and efficient management of direct sales channels, we help your brand stand out and build lasting customer relationships. Nexdor is committed to delivering comprehensive solutions, turning social media into an effective sales channel and enhancing your brand’s value!

aboutUs.title: Our Story
aboutUs.description: Nexdor Solutions takes pride in our experienced team and deep market understanding, delivering creative, personalized strategies to help clients optimize business performance and build strong brands. At Nexdor Solutions, we are not just partners but trusted companions, committed to helping you achieve every goal and create lasting value. Let us help you tell your brand story in an impressive and successful way!

coreValues.title: Core Values
coreValues.description: At Nexdor Solutions, we base our operations on three core values: Creativity, Professionalism, and Commitment to Results. These values not only guide all our activities but also serve as our promise to clients of reliability and superior quality.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: In the next 10 years, Nexdor Solutions aims to become a leading strategic partner in multi-channel commerce and brand building, accompanying over 1,000 brands—not only in the domestic market but also expanding our influence regionally and internationally. We strive to build a comprehensive service ecosystem where brands can find optimal solutions for sustainable growth and effective competition in the digital era.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Walking alongside brands on their journey to conquer the market and build sustainable value, we are committed to providing comprehensive and creative solutions in multi-channel commerce and brand building. We help clients not only achieve business goals but also establish a solid position in consumers’ minds. With this mission, Nexdor Solutions tirelessly strives to be a vital part of brands’ development journeys, contributing to inspiring success stories.
